resources.string: When enabled, the app will write its activity to a debug log file at /sdcard/cot_logging/beacon.log. This may decrease device performance.
If enabled, the app will listen for messages sent to the "All Chat Rooms" channel. Note that battery drain may be slightly higher, and chat is quite hit-or-miss with SSL servers.
If enabled, the transmission service will launch automatically after rebooting the device.
If enabled, the transmission service automatically when opening the app from the home screen, skipping the need to press "START SERVICE".
